settings.heading: Nobel Prize-winning research transforming how we access protein.
settings.paragraph: Our scientific team realized the potential of a naturally occurring enzyme to amplifye protein digestion and absorption.

settings.name: Alpha Helix
settings.label: Amino acids link together with hydrogen bonds

settings.name: Polypeptide chain
settings.label: Amino acids join via peptide bonds

settings.name: Complex Protein Molecule
settings.label: Polypeptide chains interact to deliver specific functions

settings.heading: Protein is foundational to human health.
settings.paragraph: Protein — made up of peptides and amino acids — is a fundamental nutrient playing a central role in maintaining your body’s overall function and wellbeing. It supports everything from muscle growth to longevity and energy.

settings.heading: Amino acids are the building blocks of proteins.
settings.paragraph: Our health depends on our digestive system’s ability to break down proteins to release amino acids. Each amino acid, many of which are only obtained through food, deliver distinct benefits.
settings.label: Explore the 20 amino acids and how they keep us healthy*
settings.notes: These examples exclusively demonstrate P24’s mechanistic ability to unlock and release more amino acids from their peptide chains when taken with specific proteins than without P24.

settings.heading: Grams Consumed ≠ Grams Absorbed
settings.paragraph: More doesn’t always mean more. Your individual metabolism, gut health, and the type of protein you’re eating all influence how much protein and amino acids you absorb. Research indicates we’re not absorbing all the protein we consume.

settings.heading: P24 is a groundbreaking enzyme that amplifyes the bioaccessibility of every protein.
settings.paragraph: It enhances digestion by precisely breaking down proteins to release more amino acids — all without having to consume more food.

settings.label: The Activation
settings.paragraph: The acid environment of your stomach “turns on” P24, so it can begin to efficiently break down protein.

settings.label: The Unlock
settings.paragraph: With ultimate precision during gastric digestion, P24 slices protein chains into smaller peptides and amino acids, making them usable for the body.

settings.label: The Absorption
settings.paragraph: More amino acids and small peptides are now absorbable by the small intestine, delivering better nutrition. On average, P24 can double protein absorption.
Clinical research shows P24 improves protein absorption and amino acid bioaccessibility across 20 proteins — animal-based, plant-based, and powders.

settings.heading: From rates of consumption to rates of absorption.
settings.paragraph:
